channel.title: Hugo on NeoCrypter
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on NeoCrypter

item.title: Creating my new site
item.description: Creating a site with HUGO With the way mainstream social media is going, especially twitter, I decided it’s time to make a place where I can organize my thoughts and various links to other social media platforms that I use. To that end I stumbled across HUGO a static site generator. You create markdown files which then through some techno wizardry converts to HTML ready for you to upload your site to whatever host you decide to use.
